programme.title: Middle East: Mind Your Language
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke examines the US involvement in the Isreal and Palestinian conflict.
programme.medium_synopsis: Alistair Cooke examines the historical roots of US involvement in the conflict between Isreal and the Palestinians and why, when it comes to treaties, even the smallest words count.
